description:
Misaki finally finds out where her mother has been and what she has been doing.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Fateful Reunion - An Angel Soaked with Tears
Reunião Familiar! Um Angel Ensopado De Lágrimas!
Réunies par le destin ! Des anges mouillés de larmes.
Unmei no Saikai - Namida ni Nureta Angel
運命の再会 涙に濡れたエンジェル
